summary: The module processes image files to detect products using an AI vision model, then constructs structured advertisement copy—including headline, body text, and call‑to‑action—based on the identified product attributes. It defines data models for products and ad copy, and provides utilities for loading images, invoking the language model, and orchestrating the workflow.
business_intent: Automate the creation of marketing copy from product images, helping advertisers and e‑commerce teams quickly generate compelling ad content without manual copywriting.
